sentences.en: 'They got me a long time ago,'said O'Brien with a mild, almost regretful irony.
sentences.cn: “ 他们早就把我逮到了, ” 奥勃良说,口气里略带一种几乎感到歉意的讽刺.

sentences.en: A person who does a regrettable action is often regretful afterwards.
sentences.cn: 行为不检点的人,日后往往懊悔.

sentences.en: Brumbach's voice is less explosive , almost regretful, sad in its steadiness.
sentences.cn: 布伦巴赫的声音里减少了火药味, 几乎带些懊悔的口气, 于平稳中见到些悲哀.

sentences.en: For the Chinese , September 23,1993 is a reGREtful and unforgettable day.
sentences.cn: 从此通过我们的努力,我们改善了环境,我们终于成功的申办了2008年奥运会.

sentences.en: He is regretful for what he has done.
sentences.cn: 他对自己之所为感到后悔.

sentences.en: His immediate deference made her regretful.
sentences.cn: 他毫不迟疑的顺从使她感到有些抱歉.

sentences.en: How regretful I was for my carelessness the night before!
sentences.cn: 回想起那晚我竟如此的粗心,心里就充满了懊悔.

sentences.en: I could not be more regretful of that mistake.
sentences.cn: 为此我不能感到更遗憾了.

sentences.en: Mother was most regretful when she saw the remains of the meal.
sentences.cn: 妈妈看到剩下的饭菜,很遗憾.

sentences.en: Mr Griffin gave a regretful smile.
sentences.cn: 格里芬先生遗憾地笑了笑。

sentences.en: One can imagine how regretful he was.
sentences.cn: 可以想像他是多么懊悔.

sentences.en: Otherwise, it would be too late to be regretful.
She apologized and sounded genuinely regretful.
sentences.cn: 她道歉了，听语气是真心觉得后悔。

sentences.en: The regretful tears of the past threaten my eyes.
sentences.cn: 这时,往昔一种遗憾的泪水几乎要夺眶而出.

sentences.en: This decision may make you regretful when you are alive.
sentences.cn: 这个决定可能会让你在有生之年都追悔莫及.

sentences.en: We feel regretful to his decision.
sentences.cn: 我们对他的决定感到遗憾.

words.tran_cn: 令人遗憾的；可惜的；可悲的；抱歉的

trans.tran_cn: 后悔的，失望的，令人惋惜的，遗憾的
trans.tran_en: someone who is regretful feels sorry or disappointed
